properties.title: By Quiz
properties.shortDescription: A set of questions to evaluate the knowledge that a new member has of your community or a specific topic. Useful for onboarding new members in a specific role, and easy to repurpose to distribute badges, POAP, and voting power based on knowledge and credentials.
properties.longDescription: A set of questions to evaluate the knowledge that a new member has of your community or a specific topic. Useful for onboarding new members in a specific role, and easy to repurpose to distribute badges, POAP, and voting power based on knowledge and credentials.
